2. two particles, p, of mass 2m, and q, of mass m, are moving along the same straight line 
on a smooth horizontal plane. they are moving in opposite directions towards each other 
and collide. immediately before the collision the speed of p is 2u and the speed of q is u. 
the coefficient of restitution between the particles is e, where e < 1. find, in terms of u 
and e,
 
(i) the speed of p immediately after the collision,
 
(ii) the speed of q immediately after the collision.

motion ab, as shown in figure 1.
 
find, to 3 significant figures,

(ii)  the size of the angle that the direction of this impulse makes with the original direction
